mapper.sql: ID, PROJECT_NO, DSCL_USER, IFMT_TYPE, IFMT_CONTENT_DESC, DSCL_NODE, STATE, DSCL_TIME, AUDITOR, AUDIT_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into crowdfund_ifmt_dscle (PROJECT_NO, DSCL_USER, IFMT_TYPE, IFMT_CONTENT_DESC, DSCL_NODE, STATE, DSCL_TIME, AUDITOR, AUDIT_TIME) values ( #{projectNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dsclUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ifmtType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifmtContentDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsclNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsclTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
